Class TextInfoBox

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Battle
          InfoBoxes
              TextInfoBox

public class TextInfoBox
extends InfoBoxes

The Pokemon class, to allow make a GUI in the BattleMenu. This provides all movement of cursors, as well as selection during the battles.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Hillier
